info.title: Gacha Collection Project - The Dubliners
info.description: Specifiche API del progetto divise per microservizi.

post.description: Authenticates an admin and generate a token JWT.

400.description: Invalid input

401.description: Invalid credentials

patch.description: Logs out an admin by clearing the associated JWT token.

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: The ID of the admin to log out.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token for authentication.

adminId.description: The ID of the admin who has been logged out.

400.description: Admin ID is missing in the request.

401.description: Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Admin not found in the database.

get.description: Retrieves the ID of an admin by their username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the admin whose ID is being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token for authentication.

adminId.description: The unique ID of the admin.

400.description: Username is missing in the request.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Admin not found in the database.

get.description: Verify if the user is an admin

400.description: Bad Request. Something happened on Admin Token Vaerification.

message.example: Bad Request. Something happened on Admin Token Vaerification.

401.description: Token is invalid/expired
Token is invalid/expired

404.description: Player not found

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the authentication service

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the authentication service

patch.description: Update a gacha in the catalog & in the collection of all the users.

400.description: Invalid input

401.description: Token is invalid/expired

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha market or gacha service

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha market or gacha service

get.description: Allows the admin to retrieve all Gacha collections stored in the gacha_service database.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication and authorization.

collectionId.description: The unique identifier for the Gacha collection.

name.description: The name of the Gacha collection.

description.description: A brief description of the collection.

items.description: A list of items in the collection.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the item.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the item.

204.description: No Gacha collections found in the gacha_service database.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided JWT token is invalid or missing.

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha_service.

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha service [error details].

504.description: The request to gacha_service timed out.

message.example: The request to gacha_service timed out.

post.description: Allows administrators to add a new Gacha to the catalog through the gacha_market_service.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication and authorization.

pilot_name.description: The name of the pilot associated with the Gacha.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the Gacha.

experience.description: The experience points required or associated with the Gacha.

ability.description: The special ability or feature of the Gacha.

201.description: Gacha added successfully to the catalog.

400.description: Invalid input data provided in the request body.

401.description: Unauthorized. Token is missing or invalid.

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha_market_service.

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha_market_service [error details]

503.description: The request to the gacha_market_service timed out.

message.example: The request to gacha_market_service timed out

get.description: Allows administrators to retrieve the transaction history of a specific user through the gacha_market_service.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user whose transaction history is being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token for authentication.

transactionId.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

userId.description: The ID of the user associated with the transaction.

amount.description: The amount involved in the transaction.

currency.description: The currency used in the transaction.

date.description: The date and time of the transaction.

status.description: The status of the transaction (e.g., completed, pending).

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Unauthorized access to the requested resource.

404.description: No transactions found for the specified user.

message.example: No transactions found for this user

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha_market_service.

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha_market_service [error details]

503.description: The request to gacha_market_service timed out.

message.example: The request to gacha_market_service timed out

get.description: Validates the JWT token provided in the request headers. Confirms whether the token is valid and usable.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token to be validated.

400.description: Bad Request. Something went wrong during token verification.

message.example: Bad Request. Something happened on Token Verification.

401.description: Unauthorized. Token is missing or invalid. Token has expired / Invalid token format or content.

error.example: Authentication Service has received an Invalid token / Token has expired / Invalid token

post.description: Registers a new user in the system. The user must provide a valid username, password, and email.

400.description: Invalid input or username/email already in use

delete.description: Deletes a user account based on the provided account ID.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the account to be deleted.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

400.description: Account ID is missing in the request.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Account not found

500.description: An internal error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Failed to delete Gacha collection from gacha_service due to a timeout.

message.example: Failed to retrieve user information from authentication service

patch.description: Updates the details of a user account, such as username, password, or email, based on the provided account ID.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the account to be updated.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

username.description: New username for the account (must be unique).

email.description: New email address for the account (must be unique).

400.description: Invalid input data or duplicate username/email

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Account not found

500.description: An internal error occurred during the operation.

post.description: Authenticates a user using their username and password. If successful, returns a session ID.

sessionId.description: A unique session ID for the user.

400.description: Invalid input data

401.description: Invalid credentials

patch.description: Logs out a user by clearing the associated JWT token in the database.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The ID of the account to log out.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

userId.description: The ID of the user who has been logged out.

400.description: Account ID is missing in the request.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: User not found in the database.

500.description: Internal server error during the logout operation.

get.description: Retrieves the user ID based on the provided username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user whose ID is being requested.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

userId.description: The unique ID of the user.

400.description: Username not provided

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: User not found

500.description: Internal server error during the operation.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a player based on their unique player ID.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

id.description: The unique ID of the player.

email.description: The email address of the player.

wallet.description: The current wallet balance of the player.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Player not found

500.description: Internal server error

post.description: Adds a specified amount of in-game currency to the wallet of a player identified by their player ID.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of currency to add to the player's wallet. Must be greater than zero.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

new_wallet_balance.description: The updated wallet balance of the player.

400.description: Invalid input data or amount not greater than zero

message.example: Invalid input data, amount must be greater than zero

403.description: Unauthorized action. The current user is not authorized to modify this player's wallet.

message.example: PlayerID Invalid. You are not authorized.

playerID.description: The player ID from the request.

currUserID.description: The current user ID from the token.

404.description: Player not found

500.description: Internal server error

patch.description: Updates the amount of currency in a player's wallet by adding or subtracting a specified amount.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player whose wallet is being updated.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

amount.description: The amount to add or subtract from the wallet. Can be positive or negative.

new_wallet_balance.description: The updated balance in the player's wallet.

400.description: Invalid input data or insufficient funds

invalidInput.value: Invalid input data amount field is required

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Player not found

500.description: Internal server error

patch.summary: Sottrae valuta dal wallet del giocatore
patch.description: Sottrae una quantit specificata di monete di gioco dal wallet di un giocatore specifico.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: ID del giocatore

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

amount.description: Quantit di valuta da sottrarre (deve essere positiva)

400.description: Insufficient found

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Player not found

500.description: Internal server error occurred

get.description: Retrieves the gacha collection of a specific player based on their unique user ID.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player whose gacha collection is being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

gachaId.description: The unique ID of the gacha.

204.description: The user does not own any Gacha collection.

message.example: Player does not own any Gachas

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Player not found or no gachas available

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the operation.

delete.description: Deletes all Gacha associated with a specific user.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user whose Gacha collection is being deleted.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: No Gacha collection found for the specified user.

message.example: No Gacha collection found for this user

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the operation.

post.summary: Add a gacha to a player's collection
post.description: Adds a new gacha to the collection of a specific player identified by their user ID.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player to whom the gacha will be added.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

gacha_id.description: The unique ID of the gacha.

pilot_name.description: The name of the gacha's pilot.

experience.description: The experience level of the gacha.

400.description: Invalid input data

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the operation.

get.summary: Get details of a specific gacha
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific gacha in a player's collection identified by the player ID and gacha ID.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player.

parameters.name: gachaId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gacha.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

gachaId.description: The unique ID of the gacha.

pilotName.description: The name of the gacha's pilot.

experience.description: The experience level of the gacha.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Gacha or player not found

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the operation.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of gachas missing from a player's collection
get.description: Returns the list of gachas that are missing from a player's collection compared to the complete catalog available.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The ID of the player whose missing gachas are being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

200.description: List of missing gachas retrieved successfully or player has all gachas.

gacha_id.description: Unique identifier for the missing gacha.

rarity.description: Rarity level of the missing pilot.

message.description: Message indicating the player has all gachas.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

500.description: An error occurred while communicating with the Gacha market service or an internal server error.

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with the Gacha market service or an internal server error.

503.description: The Gacha market service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

patch.summary: Update the ownership of a specific gacha
patch.description: Updates the ownership of a specific gacha, typically used after a successful auction win to transfer the gacha to a new owner.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The ID of the new owner (player) to whom the gacha will be assigned.

parameters.name: gachaID
parameters.description: The ID of the gacha that is being transferred

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

message.description: Confirmation message for successful ownership update.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Gacha not found.

message.description: Error message indicating the gacha was not found.

500.description: Internal server error occurred.

message.description: Error message for an internal server issue.

patch.description: Updates the attributes of a specific Gacha for all users who own it.

parameters.name: gacha_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Gacha to be updated.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

pilot_name.description: The updated name of the pilot.

rarity.description: The updated rarity level of the Gacha.

experience.description: The updated experience points of the Gacha.

ability.description: The updated special ability of the Gacha.

200.description: Gacha updated for all users successfully.

message.example: Gacha updated for all users successfully

400.description: Invalid input data or missing fields in the request body.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

404.description: No Gacha found for the given gacha_id.

message.example: No gacha found for given gacha_id

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Authentication or admin service is temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Allows an admin to view the entire Gacha Collection database.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

id.description: The unique ID of the Gacha entry.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the Gacha.

gacha_id.description: The unique ID of the Gacha.

pilot_name.description: The name of the pilot associated with the Gacha.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the Gacha.

experience.description: The experience points of the Gacha.

ability.description: The special ability of the Gacha.

204.description: No Gacha collections found in the database.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: The authentication or admin service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

patch.description: Updates the attributes of a specific Gacha in the catalog. Only accessible to admin users.

parameters.name: gacha_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Gacha to be updated.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

pilot_name.description: The updated name of the pilot associated with the Gacha.

rarity.description: The updated rarity level of the Gacha.

experience.description: The updated experience points of the Gacha.

ability.description: The updated special ability of the Gacha.

200.description: Gacha updated successfully in the catalog.

400.description: Invalid input data or missing fields in the request body.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

404.description: Gacha not found in the catalog.

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Authentication or admin service is temporarily unavailable.

delete.description: Allows an administrator to remove a Gacha from the catalog.

parameters.name: gacha_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Gacha to be removed.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

200.description: Gacha removed successfully from the catalog.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

404.description: Gacha not found in the catalog.

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Authentication service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

get.description: Allows administrators to view the transaction history for a specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user whose transactions are being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the transaction.

amount_spent.description: The amount spent in the transaction.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the transaction in ISO format.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

404.description: No transactions found for the specified user.

message.example: No transactions found for this user

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Authentication service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

post.description: Allows an administrator to add a new Gacha to the catalog.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

pilot_name.description: The name of the pilot associated with the Gacha.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the Gacha.

experience.description: The experience points associated with the Gacha.

ability.description: The special ability or feature of the Gacha.

201.description: Gacha added successfully to the catalog.

gacha_id.description: The unique ID of the newly created Gacha.

400.description: Invalid input data. Required fields are missing or incorrect.

403.description: Unauthorized access. The user is not an admin.

500.description: An internal server error occurred during the operation.

503.description: Authentication service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

get.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a specific user identified by their user ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user whose transactions are being retrieved.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made the transaction.

amount_spent.description: The amount of money spent in the transaction.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: No transactions found for this user

message.example: No transactions found for this user

500.description: Internal server error

message.example: An internal error occurred Database connection failed

post.description: Buys in-game currency for a player's wallet. The purchased amount is added to the player's wallet, and a transaction record is created.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player making the purchase.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of currency to purchase. Must be greater than zero.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

400.description: Invalid input data

message.example: Invalid input data Amount must be greater than zero

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Player not found

500.description: Internal server error or communication error with the authentication service

authServiceError.value: An error occurred while communicating with the auth service Timeout error

internalError.value: An internal error occurred Database connection failed

502.description: Failed to add currency due to service error

post.description: Allows the player to spend in-game currency to purchase a gacha roll and obtain a random pilot. The roll costs a fixed amount of in-game currency.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the player purchasing the roll.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

id.description: The unique ID of the pilot obtained.

pilot_name.description: The name of the obtained pilot.

rarity.description: The rarity of the obtained pilot.

experience.description: The experience level of the obtained pilot.

ability.description: The special ability of the obtained pilot.

400.description: Not enough in-game currency to purchase a roll

message.example: Not enough in-game currency to purchase a roll

404.description: Player not found or no pilots available

500.description: Internal server error or communication error with services

serviceError.value: An error occurred while communicating with the auth or gacha service Timeout error

internalError.value: An internal error occurred Database connection failed

503.description: Authentication or Gacha service is temporarily unavailable due to a timeout.

get.summary: Retrieve the complete catalog of pilots (gachas)
get.description: Returns the complete catalog of all available pilots (gachas) in the system, including their details such as rarity, experience, and special abilities.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized access. Token is missing or invalid.

404.description: No pilots available in the catalog.

message.example: No pilots available in the catalog.

500.description: Internal server error occurred.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all active auctions currently available.

auction_id.description: The unique ID of the auction.

gacha_id.description: The unique ID of the gacha being auctioned.

issuer_id.description: The ID of the user who issued the auction.

current_user_winner_id.description: The ID of the user currently winning the auction.

current_bid.description: The current highest bid for the auction.

start_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the auction started.

404.description: No active auctions found

500.description: Internal server error

message.example: An internal error occurred Database connection failed

post.description: Allows a user to auction one of their gacha items. The auction will last for a specified time (default is 1 minute).

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user setting the auction.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

gacha_id.description: The unique ID of the gacha being auctioned.

base_price.description: The starting price of the auction.

auction_id.description: The unique ID of the newly created auction.

400.description: Invalid input data

404.description: Gacha not found or not owned by user

message.example: Gacha not found or not owned by user

500.description: Internal server error or communication error with gacha service

serviceError.value: An error occurred while communicating with the gacha service Timeout error

internalError.value: An internal error occurred Database connection failed

post.summary: Place a bid on an auction
post.description: Allows a user to place a bid on a specific auction.

parameters.name: auctionID
parameters.description: The ID of the auction to place a bid on

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: The JWT token used for authentication.

user_id.description: The ID of the user placing the bid

bid_amount.description: The bid amount (must be higher than the current bid)

400.description: Invalid input, auction is not active, insufficient funds, or bid amount is too low

message.example: Bid amount must be higher than the current bid

404.description: Auction not found

500.description: Internal server error or issues communicating with external services

message.example: An error occurred while communicating with other services
